channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
well i'm making a script here that includes a .bat exe.bat to be precise but when i click on it it opens then closes this is what i have in it atm. [code]@ECHO OFF JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI color 84 echo DeltaScape Client echo Edited by Takesitsway/Vox
[/code] Thaks Ahead Of Time
(this script runs off java) i have jdk installed and my variables set!

item.title: Help?

INSTALL JAVA YOU RETARD.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

[quote=“MicroZoft, post:3, topic:230966”]This is not for a server that link you provided is down and the pause thing worked look

[code]‘JAVA’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any Suggestions?[/quote]

“Deltascape client” is not moparscape?

You need fucking jdk just go to moparisthebest.com and look up how to install it and set classpath and all that asinine stuff.

Btw gtfo out of here? The god damn forum description says NO MOPARSCAPE QUESTIONS

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

well i’m making a script here that includes a .bat exe.bat to be precise but when i click on it it opens then closes this is what i have in it atm.

[code]@ECHO OFF
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
color 84
echo DeltaScape Client
echo Edited by Takesitsway/Vox

[/code]
Thaks Ahead Of Time

(this script runs off java)
i have jdk installed and my variables set!
